tab1.title1: Welcome to The land of Anarchy

tab2.title1: Follow these rules to keep it fun and fair for everyone!
tab2.text1:
General

- No racism/\sexism

-\ No cheating

-\ No teaming

-\ No insiding

-\ Dont use default survivor names like human,\ mensch,\ mens etc

Building

-\ One main base per map

 Dont block access to obelisk and spawnpoints

Raiding/PvP

-\ No popcorning, this means dropping of items/cryos during a raid

-\ Cage time max 30 minutes except when raiding

- No raft/\platform saddle glitching

Our server rates

-\ 5x harvesting

-\ 10x XP

15x Taming

-\ 15x Breeding

-\ 5x Dino/\Player weight

-\ Max dino lvl 150

-\ Max player lvl 105 without ascension

- Tribe limit 6

- Turret limit 150
